sections.title: 1. Information We Collect
sections.content:
We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you:
• Fill out contact forms
• Subscribe to our services
• Interact with our website
• Send messages through WhatsApp

sections.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
sections.content:
We use your information to:
• Respond to your inquiries
• Provide our services
• Improve our website and services
• Send service-related communications

sections.title: 3. Information Sharing
sections.content:
We do not sell, trade, or transfer your personal information to third parties, except:
• When necessary to provide our services
• To comply with legal obligations
• With your explicit consent

sections.title: 4. Cookies and Similar Technologies
sections.content:
We use cookies and similar technologies to:
• Improve website functionality
• Analyze website usage
• Personalize your experience
• You can manage your cookie preferences in your browser settings

sections.title: 5. Data Security
sections.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

sections.title: 6. Your Rights
sections.content:
You have the right to:
• Access your personal information
• Correct inaccurate information
• Request deletion of your data
• Withdraw your consent at any time

sections.title: 7. Contact
sections.content:
If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, contact us:

• WhatsApp: +55 11 99331-3606
